biotools.summary: Tool for curation of UK Biobank data to generate cohorts. The tool can filter the main and associated datasets (e.g general practioner clinical data) based on search terms provided by the user. It can be used interactively through a web-based interface, a command line interface, or imported as a module and integrated into a broader pipeline. Additional functionality, such as automatically downloading large data files (bulk data) is also supported.
